contentrichtext.text: {{Use dmy dates|date=April 2011}} {{Infobox Paris metro |Name=Bourse |Subtitle= |Day=19 October |Year=1904 |Pic=[[File:Metro Paris - Ligne 3 - station Bourse 01.jpg|275px]] |Access= 12, place de la Bourse<br />Rue Notre-Dame-des-Victoires<br> at rue Réaumur |Municipality=the 2nd arrondissement of Paris |Zone=1 |Next= {{Paris Metro/next|3|Quatre-Septembre|Sentier}} | X=140 | Y=61 }} '''Bourse''' is a station on [[Paris Métro Line 3]]. It opened on 19 October 1904 as part of the first section of the line opened between [[Père Lachaise (Paris Métro)|Père Lachaise]] and [[Villiers (Paris Métro)|Villiers]].
